title: Tahiti Oceanfront Paradise overlooking Moorea Island's Volcanic Peaks
description: Discover pure bliss at this Tahitian paradise awaits when you stay at the InterContinental Tahiti Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel. Cast your eyes across tropical gardens bursting with greenery, a natural aquarium brimming with marine life and spellbinding panoramas of the landscapes. Feast on freshly caught seafood at Te Tiare, toast the sunset with a cocktail at the Tiki Bar and take a dip in the swimming pool, or visit the onsite spa where Polynesian-inspired treatments offer absolute relaxation.
location_description: InterContinental Resort Tahiti, an IHG Hotel
